definition: to act on behalf of sb in a responsible position/to act as an agent or proxy/surrogate/(computing) proxy
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
"break-up agent", person who acts for sb who wishes to terminate a relationship but does not have the heart to do so

pinyin: guo2 ji4 huo4 yun4 dai4 li3

sentences.english: But you can exchange it for an international one at the sole agent's office.
sentences.chinese: 但你可以換取一張國際保用證，要到總代理那裏去換。

sentences.english: The company portrays itself as the fastest growing online car-rental agency on earth.
sentences.chinese: 該公司是目前增長速度最快的在線租車代理商。

sentences.english: Grace Distribution Inc. is an American perfessional audio company since 1999.
sentences.chinese: 美國格瑞斯代理公司成立於1999年。

sentences.english: Glacial acetic acid is a dehydrating agent and an irritant and is corrosive.
sentences.chinese: 冰醋酸是個脫水代理及刺激物和腐蝕。

sentences.english: They will continue Mr. Kabe as acting principal of the school.
sentences.chinese: 他們將繼續讓凱布先生做該校代理校長。

sentences.english: I propose a sole agency aGREement for bicycles for a period of 3 years.
sentences.chinese: 我建議訂專銷自行車的爲期三年的獨家代理協議。

sentences.english: The two companies are discussing the details of the distributorship agreement.
sentences.chinese: 兩家公司正在討論代理權合約的細節。

sentences.english: Brita in grant her colony independence in the year after the second world war.
sentences.chinese: 二進制戰後的年代理英國准許其殖民地獨立。

sentences.english: Some agents have 20-30 employees on a monthly payroll, he said.
sentences.chinese: 一些代理每月會有20至30民僱員，他補充道。

sentences.english: The school had been opened only last year by the agent to the governor-general .
sentences.chinese: 這所學校是去年由英屬領地總督的代理人主持開幕的。

sentences.english: The deputy of these travelers was despatched to take the news to the travel agency.
sentences.chinese: 這些旅遊者的代理人被派遣去送口信給旅行社。

sentences.english: As long as the two sorts of rights are separated, the principal-agency relationships exist.
sentences.chinese: 只要存在兩權分離，就有可能存在委託代理關係。

sentences.english: And this article makes a simple discussion about our Foreign Trade system.
sentences.chinese: 本文即圍繞我國外貿代理制度做出初步探討。

sentences.english: By the orders of the deputy procureur?
sentences.chinese: 是奉了代理檢察官的命令嗎？

sentences.english: Group Eagle represents many world class building product brands that conform to all relevant international standards.
sentences.chinese: 羣鷹企業有限公司代理之產品完全符合國際要求。

sentences.english: Persons with no competence shall be represented by their legal agents in administrative procedures.
sentences.chinese: 無行爲能力人由他的法定代理人代爲參與行政程序。

definition: to sell as agent/to sell on commission (e.g. insurance policies)/proxy sale (of stocks)
to take up a post/to start in a new job
